EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO services for 2012 (1326726959.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO services for 2012 (1326726959.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Danilo,
Thank you for your interest in MBO Partners. Do you plan on working with Proposal Development Consultants again this year for your consulting work or have you found your own clients and you would like to run your billings through MBO for that work?
Please advise and if you have any additional questions for me please do not hesitate to reach out.
Thanks! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Danilo Herrera [mailto:daniloherrera1@gmail.com] Sent: Sunday, January 15, 2012 10:47 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: MBO services for 2012
Nicolette,
I would like to hear what I can do to use MBO services for 2012. Please contact me at your convenience, either by email or my phone number below.
Thank you -- _____________________________________ Danilo Herrera Proposal Coordination | Desktop Publishing | Graphics Phone 703-229-3337
